quotes.quote: All that glitters is not gold.
Personality is the glitter that sends your little gleam across the footlights and the orchestra pit into that big black space where the audience is.
Some girls are just born with glitter in their veins.
A life without glitter is no life at all.
When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.
Shower the world with pink and glitter.
If something doesn't look right, throw some glitter on it.
You know you're putting a good thing out into the universe when you put on glitter.
All that glitters is not hovery.
Share your sparkle wherever you are.
You know how we can be about things which sparkle and shine. We imagine they will put back something of what has been lost.
Every creature is a glittering, glistening mirror of Divinity.
A little glitter can turn your whole day around.
Glitter is the herpes of craft supplies.
There's glitter on the floor after the party.
Every woman in this world wears a little sparkle, some in their dress, and some in their eyes.
Don't let anyone or anything to dull your sparkle.
Nothing cam dim light that shines from within.
We are all of us stars and we deresrve to twinkle.
Through God, everyone sparkles.
